content: Bash: npm run check 2>&1 | grep -E "(VoiceInput|transcribe)" | head -10
Bash: curl -s http://127.0.0.1:5173/api/transcribe 2>/dev/null || echo "Dashboard not running - start with: cd dashboard && npm run dev"

Bash: cd /home/jw/code/jat && git add dashboard/src/lib/components/VoiceInput.svelte dashboard/src/lib/components/work/WorkCard.svelte dashboard/src/routes/api/transcribe/ scripts/install-whisper.sh install.sh CLAUDE.md
feat: Add local voice-to-text input using whisper.cpp
- Add VoiceInput component with MediaRecorder + local whisper transcription
- Add /api/transcribe endpoint for local whisper.cpp speech-to-text
- Integrate voice input in TaskCreationDrawer (title + description fields)
- Integrate voice input in WorkCard session text input
- Add clear button (Ã—) to WorkCard text input for quick reset
- Update install.sh with Voice-to-Text as optional Step 7/10
Voice input is 100% local - no data leaves the machine. The feature
gracefully degrades: if whisper is not installed, mic buttons don't
appear. If browser doesn't support MediaRecorder, shows disabled button.
Bash: bd close jat-ezgo --reason "Completed by PaleStorm"

content: Bash: am-reservations --agent PaleStorm --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[].path_pattern' 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo "No reservations"
Bash: am-send "[jat-ezgo] Completed: Add voice-to-text capability" "Task completed by PaleStorm.
- Voice input in TaskCreationDrawer and WorkCard
- Clear button for quick input reset
- Graceful degradation when whisper not installed
Agent is now available for next task." --from PaleStorm --to @active --thread jat-ezgo 2>/dev/null || echo "Mail sent (or no recipients)"
